Hat as a plant pot: Cut off the brim of the hat and use it as a small planter for herbs or flowers.
Hat as a sun shade: Use the hat as a makeshift sun shade for your face or eyes when you're out in the sun.
Hat as a hat stand: Use the hat as a stand for your hat collection. Simply hang the hat on the brim of another hat.
Hat as a soundproofing device: Stuff the hat with insulation material and use it as a soundproofing device for your walls or windows.
Hat as a stress reliever: Use the hat as a stress reliever by hitting it with a soft ball or balloon.
